archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0060
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner, I want a customer's new subscription cycle to begin when they activate their SIM card, so they don't lose any days of their plan during the delivery period.

properties.value: Cycle should count from the moment of manual activation. Open pont: is this manual activation step necessary for business 4/11 aib: It is assumed that BSS will send the activation date/time to OSS. OSS will then hold the request until the requested date/time. Once the requested date/time is reached OSS will trigger the request to NaaS and will send the response/status change back to BSS. BSS can decide when to charge/bill the customer.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
